name: Five Freddys At Night
description:
Look around in the dark to find the 5 Freddys at night and other secrets, game boy 4 colour palette style

made for the GameBoy jam  #GBJAM

Original size 160x144 scaleX3

Use arrows to navigate the room

Use down arrow to back to title

theres 2 rooms to left and 3 rooms to the righ, one Freddy per room

Click around for clues
